mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrPsnlInfoUsef Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ PSNL_INFO_USEF_SN , USEF_DT , USEF_SECT_CD , USEF_JOB_CD , MALL_ID , LANG_CD , DVC_CD , INFLOW_SN , BO_SITE_ID , MENU_SN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_PSNL_INFO_USEF WHERE 1 = 1 AND PSNL_INFO_USEF_SN = #{psnlInfoUsefSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteMbrPsnlInfoUsef Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM MBR_PSNL_INFO_USEF WHERE 1 = 1 AND PSNL_INFO_USEF_SN = #{psnlInfoUsefSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
